Apple has issued a new round of threat notifications to iPhone users across 98 countries, warning them of potential mercenary spyware attacks.  Itâ€™s the second such alert campaign from the company this year, following a similar notification sent to users in 92 nations in April.
title: Apple Is Alerting iPhone Users of Spyware Attacks
